name: Vibra-Tite速 825 Structural
description: Vibra-Tite速 825 Structural is an economical, multipurpose structural adhesive/sealant designed for difficult bonding and sealing applications. It is a moisture curing sealant developed for industrial uses requiring elasticity, high immediate green strength and excellent adhesion. Non-sagging but easy to gun / apply in field installations. Vibra-Tite速 825 is tough, elastic and waterproof. It bonds aggressively to steel, aluminum, ceramics, polystyrene, polyvinylidene fluoride coated metal, glass, wood and many plastics. Vibra-Tite速 825 is suited for many applications requiring adhesion to concrete and other industrial construction surfaces.
